title: Insects: how to recognise them
brief_description: Compares similarities and differences among insects in major groups. Differentiates between insects and other animals and shows the developmental stages through which insects pass from egg to adult. Shows parts of insects and briefly describes their functions. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
